medium: Watercolor, gouache, and charcoal with traces of gum glazing on pale blue paper
title: Street Scene in Vences-Cagnes
description:
cat. 45; arched doorways on street

Venice street made up of mostly one building with many arches; no people; bluish-grey paper; white matting with a modern, smooth wood, light colored frame
creditline: Collection of Yvonne and Gabriel P. Weisberg
